column2: "...yes, that was the regulated wording. Did you read it? Did you understand it? Simply put, that is how it is."
"You will get permission to search a new area if you clear the specified quest within 45 minutes.'"
"That's all there is to it, really. There's nothing else. It all depends on you."
"Whether or not you take this test is completely up to you. My job is merely to evaluate your performance."
